# Trip Management App
A comprehensive Android application for managing trips and packing lists.
## Features
### Trip Management - ✅ Create, edit, and delete trips - ✅ Add trip name, destination, and date - ✅ View all trips in RecyclerView - ✅ Filter trips by: All, Today, This Week, This Month, This Year
### Packing List Management (NEW!) - ✅ **Double-click on any trip** to view items - ✅ Add items with name, category, quantity, and description - ✅ **CheckBox support** to mark items as packed - ✅ **Category selection** via Spinner (8 categories) - ✅ **Quantity selection** via Spinner (1-20) - ✅ Color-coded category badges - ✅ Packing progress bar - ✅ Strikethrough text for packed items - ✅ Delete items with confirmation dialog
## Item Categories
1. **Clothing** (Blue) - Shirts, Pants, Shoes, etc. 2. **Toiletries** (Green) - Toothbrush, Shampoo, Soap, etc. 3. **Electronics** (Orange) - Phone Charger, Laptop, Camera, etc. 4. **Documents** (Red) - Passport, ID, Tickets, etc. 5. **Medicines** (Purple) - First Aid Kit, Prescriptions, etc. 6. **Food & Snacks** (Yellow) - Water Bottle, Snack Bars, etc. 7. **Sports & Recreation** (Cyan) - Backpack, Guidebook, etc. 8. **Other** (Gray) - Miscellaneous items
## How to Use
### Managing Trips 1. Launch the app 2. Tap "Add new Trip" to create a trip 3. Enter trip name, destination, and date 4. Tap "Save" 5. View all trips in "View My Trips"
### Managing Items 1. In "View My Trips", **double-click** on a trip 2. Tap the **+** button to add items 3. Enter item name 4. Select category from **Spinner** 5. Select quantity from **Spinner** 6. Optionally add description 7. Tap "Save" 8. **Check the checkbox** when you've packed the item 9. Watch the progress bar update!
### Filtering Trips - Use RadioButtons at the top to filter trips by date range - Options: All Trips, Today, This Week, This Month, This Year
## Technical Details
### Architecture - **Language**: Java - **UI Components**: RecyclerView, ListView, Spinners, CheckBoxes - **Pattern**: Repository pattern for data management - **Layouts**: ConstraintLayout, LinearLayout, CardView
### Key Classes - `Trip.java` - Trip entity with items ArrayList - `Item.java` - Item entity with isPacked and category - `TripAdapter.java` - RecyclerView adapter with double-click detection - `ItemAdapter.java` - ListView adapter with CheckBox support - `ViewItemsActivity.java` - Activity for managing trip items - `TripRepository.java` - Singleton repository for data management
### Double-Click Implementation - Detects two clicks within 300ms on trip items - Launches ViewItemsActivity with trip position - Single-click shows toast with trip name
## Future Enhancements
- [ ] Database persistence (SQLite/Room) - [ ] Share packing list via email/messaging - [ ] Pre-populated item templates by trip type - [ ] Search and sort items - [ ] Export to PDF - [ ] Reminders and notifications
## Installation
1. Clone the repository 2. Open in Android Studio 3. Sync Gradle 4. Run on emulator or device
## Requirements
- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later - Android SDK 21+ (Lollipop) - Gradle 8.0+
